Description:
Required Skills To Be Successful:Competent to understand & analyse Warranty claims.
SAP System Experience
Strong business acumen with excellent analytical and financial skills with the ability to use data
Team PlayerAbout The Team:The role will report to Aftersales Brand Lead and closely work with busy Electric Mobiliy Company team.What Equips You For The Role:Diploma or Degree in Mechanical/ Automotive Engineering 
Minimum 2 to 3 years of experience in a similar job profile preferably who has managed Electric Vehicles warranty claims. Job Details
